titles.title: To prohibit the use of credit cards by officers and employees of the Federal Government.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Government Management, Information and Technology.

committee.name: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight

bill.summary: 2/23/1996--Introduced. Prohibits any officer or employee of the Federal Government from using for any purpose a credit card issued to such agency (or to such officer or employee in his or her official capacity).
